nodes.text: After replacing Luuke Skywalker as the replacement for Luke Skywalker following the Lost Tribe of Sith emergence in 43 ABY, Luuuke Skywalker set out to gather all the clones created by Grand Admiral Thrawn into one force. Luuuke aimed to use this Clone Army to conquer the galaxy. Luuuke worked with Streeen to create a time machine they used to transport the Clone Army to the time of the Clone Wars, when they took on the Galactic Republic's Clone Army.
